name: Town of us
description:
You are new to town and want to enter a building. You cannot enter a building until you collect all 4 cubes. To collect them you need to help out all of the towns' people.

Controls: W A S D - to move

interact with objects:  E

Fullscreen: F

Music used: 👾PIXEL LOFI 👾 SONG FOR STUDY/SLEEP AND RELAX ⛩️ CHILL HIP HOP COMPILATION 🎵🎵🎵 - YouTube
